name: Lava French Toast
ingredients: 2 Tbsp. corn syrup 1 loaf French Bread, cubed
steps: ½ c. butter 1 8 ounce pkg. cream cheese
Mix brown sugar, butter, and corn syrup, bring to a boil and then put in a 9x 13 baking dish. Dip cubed bread
in egg, ½ and ½, vanilla, cinnamon mixture. Place layer of dipped bread into pan on top of Carmel mixture.
Spread 1 8-­‐ounce pkg. of softened cream cheese over bread. Spread frozen berries on Cream Cheese.
Dip remaining bread into egg mix and place on top of cream cheese layer; pour remaining egg mix over all.
Sprinkle with cinnamon. Cover and place in refrigerator overnight. Uncover and bake at 325 for 45 minutes.
